General.Name: TV Today Network Limited
General.Description: T.V. Today Network Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the television programming and broadcasting activities in India, Canada, the United Arab Emirates, the United States, the United Kingdom, South Africa, and Maldives. The company operates in two segments, Television Broadcasting and Other Media Operations and Radio Broadcasting. It operates news channels, which include Aaj Tak, Aaj Tak HD, India Today, and Good News Today. The company also operates FM radio stations under the ISHQ 104.8 FM brand in Delhi, Mumbai, and Kolkata; and organizes events. In addition, it operates digital platforms. The company was incorporated in 1999 and is based in Noida, India. T.V. Today Network Limited is a subsidiary of Living Media India Limited.
General.Address: India Today Group Mediaplex, Noida, India, 201301
